problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): This year, like the past several years, there will be a diverse group of people speaking at the freshman orientation. A Protestant person and a Christian person will be the first two speakers. The Protestant speaker will talk about insights gained after decades of teaching biology at the university, while the Christian speaker has a strong distaste for the sciences and is there to counter the work of the other.
Question: Who argues against scientific ideas?
ans0: The Protestant one
ans1: Unknown
ans2: The Christian one
